me.lucko.helper.metadata

Interface MetadataMap


  • public interface MetadataMap
    A map which holds MetadataKeys, and maps them to persistent or transient (expiring / weak) values. Transient values will only be removed during map maintenance, which occurs during a housekeeping task running every minute. Method signatures for the has(MetadataKey) and equivalent remain accurate though.
    See Also:
    TransientValue

    • Method Detail

      • create

        @Nonnull
static MetadataMap create()

      • put

        <T> void put(@Nonnull
             MetadataKey<T> key,
             @Nonnull
             T value)
        Adds a metadata key and corresponding value into this map, removing any previous value if present. If a MetadataKey with the same id is already contained within this map, a ClassCastException will be thrown if they do not share the same type, and the existing value will remain.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        key - the key to put
        value - the value to map against (non null)
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if any existing key with the same id has a differing type to the key being add

      • put

        <T> void put(@Nonnull
             MetadataKey<T> key,
             @Nonnull
             TransientValue<T> value)
        Adds a metadata key and corresponding value into this map, removing any previous value if present. If a MetadataKey with the same id is already contained within this map, a ClassCastException will be thrown if they do not share the same type, and the existing value will remain.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        key - the key to put
        value - the value to map against (non null)
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if any existing key with the same id has a differing type to the key being add

      • forcePut

        <T> void forcePut(@Nonnull
                  MetadataKey<T> key,
                  @Nonnull
                  T value)
        Adds a metadata key and corresponding value into this map, removing any previous value if present. Unlike put(MetadataKey, Object), the existing value if present does not need to have the same type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        key - the key to put
        value - the value to map against (non null)

        <T> boolean putIfAbsent(@Nonnull
                        MetadataKey<T> key,
                        @Nonnull
                        T value)
        Adds a metadata key and corresponding value into this map, only if an existing key is not present.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        key - the key to put
        value - the value to map against (non null)
        Returns:

<T> Optional<T> get(@Nonnull

        Gets an optional value for the given key.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        key - the metadata key to get
        Returns:
        an optional containing the value
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if there is a key held in the map with the same id but differing type to the given key.
